SEARCH
Package com.iantapply.wynncraft.player

Class PlayerCore

java.lang.Object
com.iantapply.wynncraft.player.PlayerCore
public class PlayerCore extends Object
A core class to manage all Wynncraft players that are active on the server

Used to reduce the amount of calls to the database to speed up time, to cache, and to increase response times of player data.

    • getPlayer

      public WynncraftPlayer getPlayer(UUID uuid)
      Gets a WynncraftPlayer object instance of the specified players UUID. Must be registered within the player core.
      Parameters:
      uuid - The UUID of the player to search for
      Returns:
      An instance of WynncraftPlayer if found, otherwise null
